markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unlock Secret](/Feats.aspx?ID=3973) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 44</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Open Mind](/Feats.aspx?ID=3966)

</column>

---

You delve deeper into your psychic potential. Choose a 1st-level [occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) spell, either a common spell or another to which you have access. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate occult spell.

<title level="2">Unlock Secret leads to...</title>
[Transcendent Realization](/Feats.aspx?ID=3977)
name: Unlock Secret
